metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14871 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The REENT_CHECK macro (see newlib/libc/include/sys/reent.h) as used by REENT_CHECK_TM, REENT_CHECK_MISC, REENT_CHECK_MP and other newlib macros in versions prior to 3.3.0, does not check for memory allocation problems when the DEBUG flag is unset (as is the case in production firmware builds).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14871` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnewlib-arm-none-eabi - 3.3.0-1.3
newlib-source - 3.3.0-1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: newlib package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.0-1.3').
